Title: Increases the state reimbursement rate for preventative child protective services
Summary: Increases the state reimbursement rate for preventative child protective services from 65 to 75 percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง153-k, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to increasing the state reimbursement rate for preventative child protective services
